name: "Naughty Ice Formations" Regular Mode Option
detailed_description: The "Naughty Ice Formations" DLC introduces a hilarious new incentive for successfully "blowing" your opponent! When you land an blow attack on your opponent now, you have about a 20% chance of stunning them for a full additional second, which humiliates them so badly that they form brand new ice formations!
about_the_game: The "Naughty Ice Formations" DLC introduces a hilarious new incentive for successfully "blowing" your opponent! When you land an blow attack on your opponent now, you have about a 20% chance of stunning them for a full additional second, which humiliates them so badly that they form brand new ice formations!
short_description: The "Naughty Ice Formations" DLC introduces a hilarious new incentive for successfully "blowing" your opponent! When you land an blow attack on your opponent now, you have about a 20% chance of stunning them for a full additional second, which humiliates them so badly that they form brand new ice formations!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy "Naughty Ice Formations" Regular Mode Option

content_descriptors.notes: The Naughty Ice Formations DLC contains suggestive adult images of human nudity in ice formations.  Intended for adult humor and maturity levels.
